If the optional key word “TABLEINPUT” is specified on the first line of the Lake package input file then the program reads values of lake stage, volume, and area from external lake bathymetry text files. Each lake bathymetry input file must contain exactly 151 lines with values of lake stage and the corresponding lake volume, and area in each line. Seepage between lakes and groundwater is calculated on cell-by-cell basis using the area of cells inundated by the lake, and not the lake surface area specified with the external lake bathymetry file.
